channel.title: La Grazia on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in La Grazia on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: Toni Servillo’s Standout Turn in Paolo Sorrentino’s ‘La Grazia’ Could Find Traction
item.description: The seventh collaboration between the two great Italian artists centers on a fictional Italian president.

item.title: Telluride Awards Analysis: Toni Servillo’s Standout Turn in Paolo Sorrentino’s ‘La Grazia’ Could Find Traction
item.description: The seventh collaboration between the two great Italian artists centers on a fictional Italian president.

item.title: Telluride: Jafar Panahi on Hand, George Clooney Not, as Fest Kicks Off with Patrons Brunch and ‘La Grazia’ Preview
item.description: The fest also confirmed that Bruce Springsteen will be at the fest in support of ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me from Nowhere,’ Scott Cooper’s narrative film starring Jeremy Allen White.
